title: Vivekacudamani
description: Sankara s Vivekachudamani is a popular Advaita Vedanta text which gives its basic principles. Text comes with Sanskrit and English translation. A verse index in Sanskrit is included. See also Shankara's Crest Jewel of Discrimination for a more western translation of this important scripture of Shankara.
author: Adi Shankaracharya
